answers.answer: Being thirsty constantly is also a sign of diabetes. I don't want to scare you, but I'd ask your OB about that.

I think i am going to. I talked to him today but i do have diabetes in the family. When i talked to him today i never thought of it.. Even tho i went through two water bottles in front of him smh. Lol

question: Im 13 weeks and i feel like i can never get enough to drink but i drink constantly and its always water i go through at least 75  to 100 oz a day. But it just doesnt seem enough. I feel like after just a few gulps of water my mouth is begging for more. Is this telling me i am dehydrated. I was also told by my dr today that i am really low on vitamin d, so today i started taking 10,000 iu. What my dr wants me. Could it be related? Thank u.
title: dehydration?
